name: Vitamin C Serum
description: A powerful antioxidant serum that brightens skin, fades dark spots, and boosts collagen production for a youthful glow.

name: Hyaluronic Moisturizer
description: An ultra-hydrating moisturizer infused with hyaluronic acid to deeply nourish, plump, and restore skin moisture balance.

name: Retinol Night Cream
description: A nighttime renewal cream enriched with retinol to reduce fine lines, improve skin texture, and boost cell regeneration.

name: Aloe Vera Soothing Gel
description: A lightweight, cooling gel that calms irritation, hydrates deeply, and repairs sun-damaged or sensitive skin.

name: Boosting Serum
description: A rejuvenating serum packed with collagen peptides to enhance skin elasticity and reduce the appearance of wrinkles.

name: Brightening Toner
description: A gentle toner formulated with brightening agents like niacinamide to even out skin tone and minimize dark spots.

name: Tea Tree Acne Solution
description: A clarifying solution infused with tea tree oil to combat breakouts, reduce redness, and soothe inflamed skin.

name: SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion
description: A lightweight, non-greasy sunscreen with SPF 50 to protect skin from harmful UV rays while keeping it hydrated.

name: Charcoal Detox Face Mask
description: A deep-cleansing face mask with activated charcoal to absorb excess oil, unclog pores, and detoxify skin.

name: Rose Water Hydrating Mist
description: A refreshing facial mist enriched with pure rose water to soothe, tone, and provide an instant boost of hydration.

name: Exfoliating Sugar Scrub
description: A gentle exfoliating scrub with sugar crystals to remove dead skin cells, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and radiant.

name: Shea Body Butter
description: A rich, nourishing body butter infused with coconut oil and shea butter to deeply moisturize and soften dry skin.
